com.facebook.buck.testrunner

Class BaseRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.testrunner.BaseRunner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JUnitRunner, TestNGRunner

    public abstract class BaseRunner
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for both the JUnit and TestNG runners.

      protected void writeResult(java.lang.String testClassName, java.util.List<com.facebook.buck.testrunner.TestResult> results)

        protected void parseArgs(java.lang.String... args)
